publicationStmt.p: Prepared for the NEH/DFG Mishnah-Tosefta Synopsis

note.p: Initial Transcriptions drawn from the Primary Witnesses to Tannaitic Literature
This reference text selects from witnesses to create a complete text. It presents Vienna if that exists, Erfurt if not. Where neither exists, this document presents the editio princeps
NOTE:Cases of where text is drawn from editio princeps duplicated or lacking due to inconsistent chapter divisions in the source documents.

prefixDef.p: Path to the Mishnah files for this project.
